properties.entry: SELECT CM.REF_CNO, CLASS_GRADE, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, TEACHER_NAME, ATPT_OFCDC_SC_CODE, SD_SCHUL_CODE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_MEMBER WHERE REF_CNO = CM.REF_CNO) AS USER_COUNT FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON (CM.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) WHERE CM.REF_UNO = ? ORDER BY REF_CNO
INSERT INTO CLASS VALUES (SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO CLASS_MEMBER VALUES ((SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_CODE = ?),?,?)

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO,REF_CNO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL,(SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_CODE = ?), ?, ?, '/resources/image/classProfile/',1)
SELECT CLASS_NO, TIME_TABLE_CONTENT FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON (CM.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TIME_TABLE T USING(REF_CNO) WHERE CM.REF_UNO = ? ORDER BY REF_CNO
INSERT INTO TIME_TABLE VALUES (SEQ_TNO.NEXTVAL,(SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_CODE = ?),?)
UPDATE TIME_TABLE SET TIME_TABLE_CONTENT = ? WHERE REF_CNO = ?

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME,CLASS_CODE, SUBSTR(CLASS_GRADE, 6) AS CLASS_GRADE, CLASS_TYPE_NAME, TEACHER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_MEMBER WHERE REF_CNO = CM.REF_CNO) AS USER_COUNT,CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = CM.REF_CNO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (C.CLASS_NO = A.REF_CNO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = ? AND CM.REF_UNO = ?

SELECT CM.REF_CNO, SUBSTR(CLASS_GRADE, 0,4) AS CLASS_DATE, SUBSTR(CLASS_GRADE, 6) AS CLASS_GRADE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, TEACHER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_MEMBER WHERE REF_CNO = CM.REF_CNO) AS USER_COUNT FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON (CM.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) WHERE CM.REF_UNO = ? ORDER BY CLASS_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO SCHEDULE VALUES (SEQ_SCNO.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS WHERE CLASS_CODE = ?))
SELECT CLASS_NO, S_CONTENT FROM CLASS_MEMBER CM LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON (CM.REF_CNO = C.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE S USING(REF_CNO) WHERE CM.REF_UNO = ? ORDER BY REF_CNO
UPDATE SCHEDULE SET S_CONTENT = ? WHERE REF_CNO = ?
SELECT A_CONTENT FROM ATTEND_CHECK A LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON(C.CLASS_NO = A.REF_CNO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = ? AND A_DATE = ?
INSERT INTO ATTEND_CHECK VALUES (?, ?, ?)
SELECT USER_NAME , REF_UNO FROM MEMBER JOIN CLASS_MEMBER ON (USER_NO = REF_UNO) WHERE REF_CNO = ? AND USER_LEVEL = 3 ORDER BY USER_NAME
UPDATE ATTEND_CHECK SET A_CONTENT = ? WHERE REF_CNO = ? AND A_DATE = ?
UPDATE CLASS C SET C.CLASS_GRADE = ?, C.CLASS_NAME = ? WHERE C.CLASS_NO = ? AND C.TEACHER_NAME = (SELECT USER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_LEVEL = 1 AND USER_NO = ?)
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO,REF_CNO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, '/resources/image/classProfile/',1)
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_CNO = ?
SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_GRADE, CLASS_CODE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE_NAME,TEACHER_NAME, ATPT_OFCDC_SC_CODE, SD_SCHUL_CODE FROM CLASS
UPDATE CLASS SET CLASS_CODE = ? WHERE CLASS_NO = ?
